title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Active Response Learning (ASR) for Higher Education Concept Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will be able to correctly classify science concept examples with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will demonstrate conceptual understanding by generating at least three sentences explaining differences between concepts.
Learners achieve 75 points or higher on weekly formative assessments to confirm their conceptual application skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
